logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (132703) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (132703) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: Lichen Planus (LP) with second occurrence within 365 days
logicDescription: Lichen Planus with second occurrence within 365 days after. Cohort exit is the end of continuous observable time for the person.
